metadata.name: Wings of Change
metadata.description:
This NFT is to promote fundraising for Multiplying Good through ChangeMakers! Multiplying Good's flagship service-learning and leadership development program—Students In Action—uses service and volunteerism as the vehicle for arming young people with the skills they need to be successful in college and the workforce.  Students In Action helps them grow as young leaders, educates them on the root causes of the issues facing their communities, and empowers them to make a meaningful, measurable difference through service. Students In Action is offered free of charge to all participating students across the state, including in those districts that have the fewest resources—over 55 percent of the high schoolers that participate in Students In Action in SC come from poverty circumstances.  Your support of me through ChangeMakers will go directly toward helping us give these students a shot at becoming next generation of servant leaders in the Grand Strand.

DONATE HERE: https://fundraise.givesmart.com/vf/CMGrandStrand23/JenniferHotai
